bio: Love Freedom and Public Goods üíö I am bosco.eth. I do like amplifying, learning, sharing and helping. I'm now full time at the infinite garden.
contributionDescription:
Onboarding, Governance, fostering Cross-DAO Communication, funding Public Goods and testing mechanisms, augmenting signal to noise ratio online and onchain around public goods.
Onboarding: Helped people mainly from underprivileged regions of Argentina to onboard to Ethereum ecosystem, Proof of Humanity and migrate from custodial services to non-custodial layer 1 (Ethereum) and layer 2 (Optimism and OpStack). Presented incentives alignment, use of blockchain and impact on Public Goods to the community at ‚ÄúCongreso Nacional 1¬∞ Edici√≥n ‚Äì Gesti√≥n del Agua en Ciudades Sostenibles  ‚ÄúExperiencia de Uso Eficiente del Agua en Distintos Lavados Cotidianos‚Äù Villa Dolores, C√≥rdoba, Argentina, Oral Presenter (2022).
Nominated Proof of Humanity to RPGF1.

impactDescription: bosco.eth tested technologies aligned with the optimistic vision while ensuring no-single point of failure for onboarding plans. While being at its infancy, bosco.eth is not reinventing the wheel but testing tools to becoming a decentralized onboarding public goods-oriented flywheel that bridges real world communities from a broad spectrum locally and globally using primarily Optimism and chains at the OpStack such as PGN, Zora and Base. All this while continuing active on governance, promoting and/or providing feedback at mayor public goods protocols such as PoH, ENS, diva, OPTIMISM (+OpStack), SISMO, D_D, etc. bosco.eth aids individuals and communities to explore trusted coordination tools with good UX. We expect smart contract wallets and social recovery will catalyze these endeavors.

fundingSources.description: No funds have been received. Only responsibility airdrops like diva, ens, op
